title: Claims correspondence and EOBs
dataVerified: Claimant name, provider name, claim number, service date, claim amount
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents tampering with claims documentation during appeals process. Field verification by auditors and healthcare compliance officers. Patients and providers verify claim details without calling insurer. Domain binding to insurance company prevents forged EOBs in billing disputes.
